name: FLOWERS
description:
"FLOWERS" is an exciting psychological drama that centers on David (Austin Carty - "Survivor: Panama", "One Tree Hill"), a boy who is shy and reserved, but will do anything for the girl of his infatuation ... even hurt those who get in his way.

When invited on a camping trip with Kathy, the girl of his dreams, and her boyfriend, David sees this as his chance.

Things go wrong when, after falling asleep, he wakes up in his bedroom at his house. Confused and looking for answers, David finds himself on a journey that leads to the discovery of ... what friendship is and what love is not.

If you like movies like "Donnie Darko" or "The Butterfly Effect" then you will not want to miss "FLOWERS".



DVD Features Include:
- Exclusive Behind the Scenes Footage
- Official Trailer
- And More ...

name: FLOWERS, Original Soundtrack
description: Aaron Babcock's moody score creates the suspense for BrighterMoon's thrilling psychological drama, FLOWERS. From world drums, to ambient guitar, the originality of tone is something to be heard and enjoyed by all -- And Now It Can Be!
